title: Open Source Contributions
description: Contributions I  made for some open source projects ranging from JavaScript to Django. I have mostly worked with the localization app called Pontoon, the team at Mozilla. I worked on problems that fixed specific frontend bugs, such as improving the interactive tour component and making the filter tags to display correctly.

title: Movie Search Application
description: A React.js based application that will show you current movies available to watch. It takes advantage of the Movie DataBase API and uses the data to display on the frontend as cards and on individual pages also includes a search function.

title: Budget Application
description: A fundamental vanilla Javascript application,  As a financial enthusiast, I wanted an easy way to keep track of income and expenses. This application serves that purpose as simple as possible.
